title: Serpentine Sans Bold Oblique knock-off
content:
Any ideas? Looks like a free font.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Naughty.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415075501/http:/typophile.com/files/Naughty.jpg) | 58.82 KB |
author: ill sans

comments.content:
"Naughty": **[Nationalyze (ALP)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415075501/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Nationalyze%20-%20ALP&fid=57834ef2b0f3a52999c368bf6e62e5a7&fsize=60&text=Naughty&wrap=2)** by Kotaroh Hatano  
"Control": **[Enter Sansman (Bold Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415075501/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Enter%20Sansman%20-%20Bold%20Italic&fid=430f924767e9ff2806af994304cbdee1&fsize=60&text=Control&wrap=2)** free font by Digital Graphic Labs ( [http://www.digitalgraphiclabs.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415075501/http:/www.digitalgraphiclabs.com/ "http://www.digitalgraphiclabs.com"), 1998)
